page.title: 10ATTITUDES FORRES EAST
page.content: We asked some 13-year-old children what their attitudes were on local things. We asked them :- If they would prefer to shop in a supermarket which sells everything in one shop or in a group of small shops which sell different things. 78% said they would prefer to shop in supermarkets. 22% said they would prefer to shop in small shops. If they thought supermarkets should be built in a town centre or outside the town where they were less obvious. 86% said it should be be built outside the town, and 14% said it should be built in the town centre. If they thought Forres should have more evening entertainment ie. discos, cinemas and dances. Everyone thought it should have more evening entertainment.
